content: Does lean4-mode support Lake? I have tried to create a simple project with lake init hello and in Main.lean I'm getting error on importing Hellounknown package 'Hello'.
It does support lake yes, is your lean4-mode at the latest version?
I must be doing something wrong, where do I get latest version? I'm using lean4-mode from lean4 github repository, and the last commit there was two months ago.
That would be the correct version yes...in that case I don't know to be honest, it's always just worked :tm: like that for me. But someone else will surely have an idea.

:face_palm: I have a directory doodle with bunch of lean tests that is already registered as a lsp workspace and I have created a new directory doodle/hello for the lake project. Thus lsp thought that doodle is the root directory and not doodle/hello. Yeah everything just works ... I'm just dumb :)
Tomas Skrivan has marked this topic as resolved.
